list.name: docs-output-filter
list.desc: Filters mkdocs or sphinx build output to show only warnings and errors with nice formatting. Cuts through the noise so you can focus on what actually needs fixing.

list.name: jupyterlab-collab-mcp
list.tagline: MCP server for collaborative JupyterLab editing
list.desc: A JupyterLab extension that integrates Claude Code directly into your notebook workflow via the Model Context Protocol.

list.name: script-bisect
list.tagline: Bisect package versions to find when a bug appeared
list.desc: Automates bisecting package versions in PEP 723 Python scripts using git bisect and uv. Useful for pinpointing exactly which version of a dependency introduced a bug.

list.name: jlabx
list.tagline: Launch JupyterLab with extensions â€” no install, no config
list.desc: Run JupyterLab with any combination of extensions instantly using uvx. No virtualenv setup or pip install needed.

list.name: third-wheel
list.tagline: Rename Python wheels for multi-version installation
list.desc: Rename Python wheel packages so you can install multiple versions of the same package in a single environment. Useful for regression testing across library versions.

list.name: fdprof
list.tagline: Profile open file descriptors of a running process
list.desc: A utility to inspect and profile the open file descriptors of a running process. Helpful for diagnosing file descriptor leaks or understanding what files a process has open.
